text: The John Smith House is a historic building located at 124 Washington Valley Road in the Washington Valley section of Morris Township, Morris County, New Jersey. The two-story brick house was built in 1812, with the year set in black brick on the west gable. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places on January 1, 1976. It is also a contributing property of the Washington Valley Historic District. ==See also== *National Register of Historic Places listings in Morris County, New Jersey ==References== ==External links== * Category:National Register of Historic Places in Morris County, New Jersey Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in New Jersey Category:Historic district contributing properties in Morris County, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Register of Historic Places Category:1812 establishments in New Jersey Category:Morris Township, New Jersey Category:Brick buildings and structures Category:Historic American Buildings Survey in New Jersey
title: John Smith House (Washington Valley, New Jersey)
